mapper.select: select m.mean_id, m.definition, m.seq, w.word_id, w.word, date_format(w.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_ymd, date_format(w.reg_date, '%m-%d') as reg_md from vocabulary.voc_mean m left join vocabulary.voc_word w on (w.word_id = m.word_id) where w.user_id = #{userId} order by w.reg_date desc, w.mean_id desc;
mapper.update: update vocabulary.voc_mean set definition = #{definition} where mean_id = #{meanId} and word_id = #{wordId};
